long_description: The BOB Motion Snack Tray is designed to fit the BOB Motion stroller and provides a convenient platform for on-the-go snacks and toy time. Offers a sippy cup holder and a tray for snacks or toys. Tray can be aasily detached from either side of the stroller for convenient loading and unloading of your child. Compatible with BOB Motion strollers (sold separately).
short_description: The BOB Motion Snack Tray is designed to fit the BOB Motion stroller and provides a convenient platform for on-the-go snacks and toy time.
